cost.description: The final cost of the order after taxes, charges, and discounts have been applied.

taxAmount.description: The total tax charged to the order.

chargeAmount.description: The total cost of charges to the order, excluding tax.

grossSalesAmount.description: The total cost of the order, excluding deposits, taxes, and other charges.

depositAmount.description: The cost of deposits paid when purchasing cans, bottles, and kegs.

pointsEarned.description: The total number of points earned when that order was placed.
